name: Cognitive Fractal Axiom
intent: Define cognitive fractals as representational SFOs with concept spaces and abstraction maps.
constraints: Concept space K\_n at scale n is defined as R\_n modulo an equivalence relation based on behavioral indistinguishability under Π and agency dynamics.
There exists a functor G: Scale \-\> Concept where G(n) \= K\_n.
Abstraction maps α\_{n-\>n+1}: K\_n \-\> K\_{n+1} are natural transformations across scales.
The colimit Colim(G) exists and is non-trivial, representing hierarchical concepts.
